EmailTemplate.description: Expired multi's and singles - active users
EmailTemplate.name: CW.sub+2019conferencepass.v2
EmailTemplate.subject: New 2019 subscriber options from CW!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi James,
It’s nice to meet you! As a former subscriber and current user of Compliance Week, I was hoping to chat with you regarding some new membership options recently developed specifically for practitioners like yourself.
We’ve heard recent feedback that it is highly preferable if CW subscription has conference attendance built right into a broader membership offering. To this end, please see the brand new packaging we’re rolling out now to help folks prep and plan for the new year ahead!
With key accounting concerns, data privacy regulation, third-party risk and ongoing changing regulations, Compliance Week is here to help! Please review the options below and advise how we could best work with you and your team!
5 Seat Multi User Subscription, & 1 FREE conference pass to any Compliance Week event in 2019 - $2,999 (Regularly $3,499, plus registration fee) Single User Subscription & 1 FREE conference pass to any Compliance Week event - $999 (Regularly $1,199, plus registration fee)
*Offer available for new subscribers
To activate your discounted rate & secure free conference attendance, just respond to this email with an “I agree” and the option of your choice. You can sign-up for your conference of choice during the respective open registration period.
Subscription benefits & 2019 events schedule:
The most pertinent in-depth expert analysis at your fingertips -news articles, blogs, and thought leadership geared towards specific topics of interest to you. On-Demand CPE Library - Webcast Forums, Whitepapers - Register for Live Webcasts or earn credits anytime at your convenience. Weekly Newsletters - Business intelligence with in-depth expert analysis every Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. Print Magazine - Delivered 6x per year and available in digital form. Comprehensive Archives, Corporate Documents, and Benchmarking Tools. Compliance Week Conferences 2019*
New! Compliance Week West – March 11-12, 2019, San Francisco, Data Privacy, Data Analytics, and Big Data Summit 4th Annual TPRM, Third Party Risk Management & Oversight Summit, March 25-26, 2019, New York City
Compliance Week Annual 2019, May 20-22, 2019, Washington D.C. Compliance Week Europe 2019, November 2019, Amsterdam
*All conferences subject to change
Join thousands of the world's leading compliance professionals who use Compliance Week analysis on a daily basis, including executives from Wal-Mart Stores Inc., Microsoft, Verizon, General Electric, Cardinal Health, Fannie Mae, Prudential Financial, Phillips 66, Anthem, Target, and many other Fortune 100 organizations.
Thanks James – I look forward to connecting with you!
Warm regards,
E-
Elizabeth Sucher Compliance Week, Subscription Director Elizabeth.sucher@complianceweek.com T (617) 570-8605 | m (617) 671-5531
